entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 80

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
